dcterms:creator: Saif Mohammad
Svetlana Kiritchenko
Parinaz Sobhani
Xiaodan Zhu
Colin Cherry
dcterms:description: The SemEval-2016 Task 6 Sub-task A dataset contains five targets: Atheism, Climate Change is a real Concern, Feminist Movement, Hillary Clinton, and Legalization of Abortion. It is widely used for stance detection tasks.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2016 Task 6 Sub-task A dataset

dcterms:creator: Christian Stab
Tristan Miller
Benjamin Schiller
Pranav Rai
Iryna Gurevych
dcterms:description: The UKP dataset consists of eight different topics, including Abortion, Cloning, Death Penalty, Gun Control, Marijuana Legalization, Minimum Wage, Nuclear Energy, and School Uniforms. The comments in UKP are longer, making classification more difficult.
dcterms:title: UKP dataset

dcterms:creator: Emily Allaway
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: VAST is a zero-shot and few-shot stance detection dataset that consists of a large range of targets covering broad themes, such as economy, traffic, and religion. It can be used to test the robustness of stance detection methods in real-world situations with few data.
dcterms:title: VAST dataset
